ygData.subject: Wedding on Innoruuk
ygData.msgSnippet: My dear fellow bards of all ages shapes and sizes. I wished to post to announce an upcoming event on the Innoruuk server that is very special to me..my
ygData.messageBody:
My dear fellow bards of all ages shapes and sizes. I wished to post to
announce an upcoming event on the Innoruuk server that is very special to
me..my wedding:) Kambei Shimada an Erudite Wizard of great skill..and
greater charm... has asked me to become his wife..and the blood of my gyspy
mother pounds hot in my veins with love for him! I invite those here to
come and celebrate with us!

When: Sept. 26th (sunday) at 5PM EST
Where: lesser faydark at the stone bird monument (LOC -365, -1669)

There will be drinking..dancing..songs (OF COURSE) and no doubt a dueling I
also have hopes of pulling together a small contest or two for those who
attend to amuse themselves with.

Elyana Silvanae
Happiest woman in Norrath
Bardess of the 40th Chorus
